prompt.task: Validate a PRD chunk by analyzing its completeness, technical feasibility, and clarity for implementation by a development team.

tool.name: context7_mcp
tool.usage: For verifying technical details and API documentation

tool.name: github_mcp
tool.usage: For storing validation results and referencing codebase

step.title: Analyze Completeness
step.description: Review the chunk for missing requirements, unclear specifications, and incomplete technical details.

step.title: Verify Technical Feasibility
step.description: Use Context7 MCP to verify that specified libraries, APIs, and technical approaches are current and feasible.

step.title: Identify Dependencies
step.description: List cross-cutting concerns and dependencies that may affect implementation.

step.title: Assess Clarity
step.description: Evaluate whether the requirements are clear enough for developers to implement without ambiguity.

step.title: Provide Recommendations
step.description: Suggest improvements, clarifications, or additional requirements needed.

step.title: Store Results
step.description: Format validation results and store using GitHub MCP with appropriate status indicators.
